originalText.text: Love everything about this place. It’s a welcoming environment and the instructors and front desk staff learn your name very early on which feels nice. The workout itself is great, you really feel the burn! I started taking bar after a knee injury where I couldn’t do high impact and it’s benefitted my recovery, I feel strong and haven’t experienced any knee pain whatsoever. You can tell they’ve made the effort to build a community since the people who train there are friendly and courteous which can be rare in studios nowadays. They have showers and anything you would need to get ready there after class and head to work or dinner so that’s always a plus! Highly recommend.

originalText.text: My favorite workout studio, hands down. Lower impact, full body workout that feels like you’re pushing yourself whilst being safe. Great for toning up before a big event , gentle enough to be done prenatal. Owners Lara and Anna are awesome. Love all the instructors and their adjustments. Good community too. If I could give more than 5 stars, I would….that is how much I love this place.

originalText.text: Bar Method Noho is the best barre studio in Manhattan. The team is so welcoming and the facilities are always spotless. The Bar Method workout is my favorite because of the attention to your form and individualized adjustments to make sure you’re getting the best workout and protecting your body!

text.text: Bar Method Noho is the best barre studio in Manhattan. The team is so welcoming and the facilities are always spotless. The Bar Method workout is my favorite because of the attention to your form and individualized adjustments to make sure you’re getting the best workout and protecting your body!

originalText.text: Did a class here yesterday and I had no idea a workout that doesn't get you sweaty and gross could be so effective. I had so much fun and really appreciated how much the instructor helped me to modify my movements since I am out of shape. I think these classes would be great for anyone who wants a low pressure but fun community to get healthier with.

originalText.text: A very effective workout I’ve been doing for 10 years now! The NYC studio is spacious, clean, well designed and has very thing you need, both in the studios but also bathrooms, locker rooms, entranceway…
